tasks.title: Enhance Elements System
tasks.description: Complete the ElementsManager interface and element type registration system to match the JavaScript implementation
tasks.details: Implement complete ElementsManager interface matching `editor/elements/manager.js`. This includes element type registration, element collections and models interfaces, comprehensive element views type system, element type validators and error handling, and support for custom element types.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate against JavaScript ElementsManager implementation, ensure all methods and properties are typed correctly, test element registration workflow

tasks.title: Complete Container System
tasks.description: Enhance Container interface to fully match the container.js implementation with panel integration and model binding
tasks.details: Complete Container interface matching `editor/container/container.js`. Include container panel integration, container model with data binding, container hierarchy and relationships, and container rendering and lifecycle management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test container creation, manipulation, and destruction. Verify panel integration and model synchronization

tasks.title: Expand Editor Base Interface
tasks.description: Enhance ElementorEditor interface to cover all methods and properties from EditorBase class
tasks.details: Add missing properties like widgetsCache, loaded, previewLoadedOnce. Implement missing methods including getElementData, mergeControlsSettings, getControlView, getPreviewView and all other methods from editor-base.js
tasks.testStrategy: Compare interface with actual EditorBase implementation, ensure all public methods are properly typed

tasks.title: Implement Command System Framework
tasks.description: Create comprehensive command system with base classes, document operations, panel commands, and element manipulation
tasks.details: Expand command base classes with proper inheritance, implement document operation commands, add panel manipulation commands, create element manipulation command interfaces, implement command history and undo/redo system, add command validation and error handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test command execution, validation, and history management. Verify inheritance hierarchy works correctly

tasks.title: Implement Document System
tasks.description: Create complete document component system with save functionality, history, and element relationships
tasks.details: Implement document component base classes, document helpers and utilities, element-document relationships, global document state management, document save and auto-save functionality, document history and versioning.
tasks.testStrategy: Test document creation, saving, loading, and history management. Verify element-document relationships

tasks.title: Implement Admin Module Types
tasks.description: Create comprehensive admin module interfaces covering beta tester, floating elements, templates, and maintenance mode
tasks.details: Implement beta tester component types, floating elements system types, new template dialog types, admin feedback system interfaces, maintenance mode functionality types, Gutenberg integration interfaces, menu handler types.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate against admin JavaScript modules, test all admin component interfaces

tasks.title: Expand Editor Components
tasks.description: Implement template library, icons manager, dynamic tags, settings, and browser import components
tasks.details: Template library component system with full CRUD operations, icons manager component with icon registry, dynamic tags component with tag resolution, settings component with configuration management, browser import component with file parsers, selection component, validator component.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each component individually and integration with main editor system

tasks.title: Implement Controls System
tasks.description: Complete all control types including box-shadow, dimensions, gaps, and control behaviors
tasks.details: Complete all control types (box-shadow, dimensions, gaps, etc.), control behaviors and interactions, control validation and sanitization, control groups and repeaters, conditional control display logic.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all control types, validation, and behavior systems. Verify control groups and repeaters work correctly

tasks.title: Implement Frontend Widget Handlers
tasks.description: Create specific widget handler interfaces for common Elementor widgets with registration and lifecycle management
tasks.details: Specific widget handler interfaces for common widgets (Accordion, Tabs, etc.), handler registration and lifecycle management, widget configuration and state management, event handling system for widgets, responsive behavior handling, animation and transition support.
tasks.testStrategy: Test widget handler registration, lifecycle, and event handling. Verify responsive behaviors

tasks.title: Complete Frontend System
tasks.description: Enhance frontend document management, elements handlers manager, and utilities
tasks.details: Frontend document management, elements handlers manager enhancement, frontend utilities and helpers, responsive breakpoint handling, performance optimization types.
tasks.testStrategy: Test frontend system integration, document management, and performance optimizations

tasks.title: Enhance Utilities and Helpers
tasks.description: Implement advanced utility functions, event system, hooks, and React integration helpers
tasks.details: Advanced utility functions, event system enhancements, hook system improvements, notification system types, React integration helpers.
tasks.testStrategy: Test utility functions, event system, and React integration. Verify hook system works correctly

tasks.title: Implement Type Safety Validation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive type checking and validation system to ensure interface completeness
tasks.details: Type-only tests to verify interface completeness, integration tests with actual Elementor codebase, validation against JavaScript implementation, performance testing for type checking.
tasks.testStrategy: Run comprehensive type checking, validate against real Elementor usage, performance benchmarks

tasks.title: Create Documentation System
tasks.description: Generate comprehensive documentation with JSDoc comments, usage examples, and API reference
tasks.details: Comprehensive JSDoc comments for all public interfaces, usage examples for complex systems, migration guides for breaking changes, API reference documentation.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify documentation completeness, test examples, validate API reference accuracy

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize TypeScript compilation performance and runtime type checking
tasks.details: Optimize TypeScript compilation performance, minimize runtime impact, implement efficient type checking, optimize bundle size for type definitions.
tasks.testStrategy: Performance benchmarks, compilation time tests, bundle size analysis

tasks.title: Integration Testing and Validation
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing with real Elementor projects and community validation
tasks.details: Test with real Elementor projects, validate with community feedback, ensure backward compatibility, performance validation, integration with popular development workflows.
tasks.testStrategy: Real-world project testing, community beta testing, performance validation, compatibility testing
